subject: Sales
title: The Summary Close
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: The Summary Close.

hook.text: Before asking for the sale, a rep lists every point of agreement. Suddenly the yes feels inevitable.

buildup.text: The summary close recaps every benefit and agreement from the entire conversation.

discovery.text: It works by stacking value. Hearing the full list makes the price feel small by comparison.

twist.text: Weak summaries just repeat features. Strong ones echo the buyer's own words and priorities back.

climax.text: The summary close turns a scattered conversation into a clear, confident case for saying yes.

punchline.text: Recap the value and the close handles itself.

quiz.question: What makes a summary close strong?
options: Listing every feature of the product
Echoing the buyer's own words and priorities
Offering a discount at the end
